stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.3 – 15 Years of Open, Evolving Image Viewing
stable.description: This release marks the 15th anniversary of ImageGlass, introducing full support for File Explorer sort order, a self-contained deployment that eliminates the need for the .NET Desktop Runtime, and new features including Live Photo (JPEG) playback and color inversion.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.3 – 15 Years of Open, Evolving Image Viewing
